security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and workflow guidance. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or file system access beyond skill metadata. The TypeScript code examples are illustrative only.

content.value_statement: Development teams struggle to maintain consistent workflow discipline across features. This skill enforces TDD methodology, AC validation, and scope management for every implementation task.
actual_capabilities: Automatically activates when implementation keywords are detected
Validates acceptance criteria before starting implementation
Verifies all AC requirements before task completion
Manages scope to prevent feature creep
Integrates with branch and PR skills automatically
limitations: Requires pre-defined Subtask files with acceptance criteria
Only supports projects following EPIC-Story-Subtask structure
Workflow is enforced for each task individually

use_cases.title: Maintain development discipline
use_cases.description: Follow TDD methodology consistently for every feature implementation

use_cases.title: Standardize workflow
use_cases.description: Enforce acceptance criteria and scope boundaries across team members

use_cases.title: Quality gate enforcement
use_cases.description: Ensure all implementations meet AC requirements before PR creation

best_practices: Break down requirements into clear acceptance criteria before implementation
Write failing tests first, then implement minimum code to pass
Verify each acceptance criterion is satisfied before completing
anti_patterns: Implementing features not defined in acceptance criteria
